metadata.title: CVE-2022-40150 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: Those using Jettison to parse untrusted XML or JSON data may be vulnerableto Denial of Service attacks (DOS). If the parser is running on usersupplied input, an attacker may supply content that causes the parser tocrash by Out of memory. This effect may support a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: libjettison-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
